txt.en:
'Oh, that Vulmar! I'd wager he caught that squirrel and put it in there to make me think Old Mad Ubb was on the loose! Vulmar is always trying to trick me!'

Odulf starts to cry, but then he wipes his eyes and the sniffles stop.

'Do you know something? I think I have seen that squirrel before. He is friends with that funny man in brown who lives around here. You should bring him the squirrel! He probably misses his friend. I know I would! I wouldn't miss Vulmar, though, not at all! Let him find new friends if he seeks to keep tricking the ones he already has! I think you should scold Vulmar first, and then find the man in brown!'
The squirrel is surprisingly friendly
The squirrel can be found in Blómgard.\n\nYou should pick up the squirrel.
'I am sorry for scaring Odulf and trapping that squirrel you have.'
Show the squirrel to Odulf
Search barrels and crates for the ghost
Vulmar feels bad about what he did
Pick up the squirrel
'Do not wander off again without letting me know, little one.'
Odulf can be found in Blómgard.\n\nYou should show the squirrel to Odulf.
Radagast can be found in Laerlad.\n\nYou should bring the squirrel to Radagast.
The Ghost of Old Mad Ubb
A ghost seems to be terrorizing the children of Blómgard.
According to Odulf, the ghost of Old Mad Ubb is somewhere in Blómgard.\n\nYou should search the barrels and crates to make Odulf feel better.
Vulmar can be found in Blómgard.\n\nYou should <rgb=#00FF00>scold</rgb> Vulmar.
'Why look who you found!'
Something is in there! Is that a squirrel?

'Why, look who you found! What good fortune! I have been searching for this little one everywhere. Well, not everywhere, I suppose, for I found him not. Together, perhaps, we searched everywhere!\n\n'Thank you, [placeholder]. I would say my friend here needs to be a little more careful. Indeed, I will say it! You should be more careful where you scamper off to, little one!'
'Why look who you found! I have been searching for this one everywhere. Thank you [placeholder]. My friend needs to be a little more careful, I would say.'
'Why look who you found!'
Something is in there! Is that a squirrel?
Bring the squirrel to Radagast
Something is in there! Is that a squirrel?
<rgb=#00FF00>Scold</rgb> Vulmar
Nothing in there
The crate is empty

'Oh my, a [placeholder]! That is what you are, is it not? My name is Odulf and I need your help! My brother Vulmar says there is a ghost in Blómgard. Not just any old ghost though, no! It is the ghost of Old Mad Ubb! I saw it, I saw it! Well, I saw a barrel or a crate move, I did! Please catch the ghost, [placeholder]! Please, oh please, will you?'
